languages.text: "Звездн{rt_mf|ый|ая} Госпо{rt_mf|дин|жа} даровал{rt_mf||а} мне честь лобызать {rt_mf|его|ее} сапоги и очищать их от дорожной пыли. Не было для меня радости более великой — я словно прильнула губами к звездам, по которым {rt_mf|он|она} ступала!"

traits.locale_text: "Звездн{mf|ый|} Госпо{mf|дин|жа} заставил{mf||а} меня... чистить {mf|его|ее} подошвы языком".

languages.text: "The Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} granted me the honour of kissing {rt_mf|his|her} boots and wiping the dust of the road from them. Never have I known greater joy. It was like pressing my lips to the stars {rt_mf|he|she}'d walked on!"
languages.original_text: "Звездн{rt_mf|ый|ая} Госпо{rt_mf|дин|жа} даровал{rt_mf||а} мне честь лобызать {rt_mf|его|ее} сапоги и очищать их от дорожной пыли. Не было для меня радости более великой — я словно прильнула губами к звездам, по которым {rt_mf|он|она} ступала!"

traits.locale_text: "The Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} granted me the honour of kissing {rt_mf|his|her} boots and wiping the dust of the road from them. Never had I known greater joy; it was like pressing my lips to the stars {rt_mf|he'd|she'd} walked on!"

"The Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} granted me the honour of kissing {rt_mf|his|her} boots and wiping the dust of the road from them. Never had I known greater joy; it was like pressing my lips to the stars {rt_mf|he'd|she'd} walked on!"

"The Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} granted me the honour of kissing {rt_mf|his|her} boots and wiping the dust of the road from them. Never have I known greater joy. It was like pressing my lips to the stars {rt_mf|he'd|she'd} walked on!"

"The Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} granted me the honour of kissing {rt_mf|his|her} boots and wiping the dust of the road from them. Never have I known greater joy. It was like pressing my lips to the stars {rt_mf|he'd|she'd} walked on!"

"The Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} granted me the honour of kissing {rt_mf|his|her} boots and wiping the dust of the road from them. Never have I known greater joy. It was like pressing my lips to the stars {rt_mf|he|she}'d walked on!"

"The Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} granted me the honour of kissing {rt_mf|his|her} boots and wiping the dust of the road from them. Never have I known greater joy. It was like pressing my lips to the stars {rt_mf|he|she}'d walked on!"

languages.text: “来自上界的大人赐予了我无上的荣耀，允许我亲吻{rt_mf|他|她}的靴子，拭去上面的尘土。我从来没这么开心过，感觉就像是亲吻了{rt_mf|他|她}曾踏足过的群星一样！”
languages.original_text: "The Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} granted me the honour of kissing {rt_mf|his|her} boots and wiping the dust of the road from them. Never have I known greater joy. It was like pressing my lips to the stars {rt_mf|he|she}'d walked on!"

traits.locale_text: “来自上界的大人赐予了我无上的荣耀，允许我亲吻{rt_mf|他|她}的靴子，拭去上面的尘土。我从来没这么开心过，感觉就像是亲吻了{rt_mf|他|她}曾踏足过的群星一样！”

languages.text: «{rt_mf|El Señor|La Señora} Celestial me otorgó el honor de besar sus botas y limpiar el polvo del camino de ellas. Nunca he sentido una felicidad igual. ¡Fue como besar las estrellas por las que ha caminado!».
languages.original_text: "The Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} granted me the honour of kissing {rt_mf|his|her} boots and wiping the dust of the road from them. Never have I known greater joy. It was like pressing my lips to the stars {rt_mf|he|she}'d walked on!"

traits.locale_text: «{rt_mf|El Señor|La Señora} Celestial me otorgó el honor de besar sus botas y limpiar el polvo del camino de ellas. Nunca he sentido una felicidad igual. ¡Fue como besar las estrellas por las que ha caminado!».

languages.text: "Semavi {rt_mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}, çizmelerini öpüp yol tozunu silme şerefini bana bahşetti. Böylesi bir sevinci hiç tatmamıştım. Sanki dudaklarımı üzerinde yürüdüğü yıldızlara değdirdim!"
languages.original_text: "The Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} granted me the honour of kissing {rt_mf|his|her} boots and wiping the dust of the road from them. Never have I known greater joy. It was like pressing my lips to the stars {rt_mf|he|she}'d walked on!"

traits.locale_text: "Semavi {rt_mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}, çizmelerini öpüp yol tozunu silme şerefini bana bahşetti. Böylesi bir sevinci hiç tatmamıştım. Sanki dudaklarımı üzerinde yürüdüğü yıldızlara değdirdim!"

languages.text: 「天の{rt_mf|君|姫}は私に{rt_mf|彼|彼女}の靴に口付けし、道の埃を払う栄誉を与えてくれた。あんなに大きな喜びを味わったことなんてないよ。まるで{rt_mf|彼|彼女}が歩まれてきた星々に唇を寄せたみたいだった！」
languages.original_text: "The Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} granted me the honour of kissing {rt_mf|his|her} boots and wiping the dust of the road from them. Never have I known greater joy. It was like pressing my lips to the stars {rt_mf|he|she}'d walked on!"

traits.locale_text: 「天の{rt_mf|君|姫}は私に{rt_mf|彼|彼女}の靴に口付けし、道の埃を払う栄誉を与えてくれた。あんなに大きな喜びを味わったことなんてないよ。まるで{rt_mf|彼|彼女}が歩まれてきた星々に唇を寄せたみたいだった！」

languages.text: « Sa Céleste Seigneurie m'a accordé l'honneur d'embrasser ses bottes et de nettoyer la poussière qui les ternissait. Je n'avais jamais ressenti une telle joie. J'ai eu l'impression de poser mes lèvres sur les étoiles qu'{rt_mf|il|elle} avait explorées ! »
languages.original_text: "The Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} granted me the honour of kissing {rt_mf|his|her} boots and wiping the dust of the road from them. Never have I known greater joy. It was like pressing my lips to the stars {rt_mf|he|she}'d walked on!"

traits.locale_text: « Sa Céleste Seigneurie m'a accordé l'honneur d'embrasser ses bottes et de nettoyer la poussière qui les ternissait. Je n'avais jamais ressenti une telle joie. J'ai eu l'impression de poser mes lèvres sur les étoiles qu'{rt_mf|il|elle} avait explorées ! »

languages.text: "{rt_mf|Der himmlische Herr|Die himmlische Herrin} hat mir die Ehre gewährt, {rt_mf|seine|ihre} Stiefel zu küssen und den Staub der Straße von ihnen abzuwischen. Nie habe ich größere Freude empfunden. Als hätte ich meine Lippen auf die Sterne gedrückt, auf denen {rt_mf|er|sie} gewandelt ist!"
languages.original_text: "The Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} granted me the honour of kissing {rt_mf|his|her} boots and wiping the dust of the road from them. Never have I known greater joy. It was like pressing my lips to the stars {rt_mf|he|she}'d walked on!"

traits.locale_text: "{rt_mf|Der himmlische Herr|Die himmlische Herrin} hat mir die Ehre gewährt, {rt_mf|seine|ihre} Stiefel zu küssen und den Staub der Straße von ihnen abzuwischen. Nie habe ich größere Freude empfunden. Als hätte ich meine Lippen auf die Sterne gedrückt, auf denen {mf|er|sie} gewandelt ist!"
